history.content: At the moment there are no alternates, there used to be grand-fathering options before.

In some cases, students may complete alternative courses to satisfy the above prerequisites. See the lower-division requirements page on the Data Science program website for more details.

The data science major requirements website says this, but the hyperlink leads to an "access denied". 

What are these specific cases? I am a declared cs junior right now, and data 8 is filled up for next semester. I want to declare a data science double ASAP for recruiting purposes fall 2020, and data 8 does not seem to have an online offering during this summer (I will be working far from Berkeley).
history.subject: Data science substitutions for data 8?
